text: Jisu'n angme inmani ngaidon kha aleijet, halli inmani diang ama'n aleiril, “Rengram rakip in intheinuo ah rup inthenkhoiya inkhat li inkhat ininsuol inchu kasoot ah ngirmatornunu. Halli khuopui inkhattak emakli innsuungkhur inkhat li inkhat ininsuolla rup inthenkhoi inchu lekni ah chulsik eii.”
